Text.Page:
Have to move faster than that, soldier. These are the big guns.

Go kill {@LinkCreature:37#280#athakelas}, {@LinkCreature:37#300#kalashes}, {@LinkCreature:37#330#chukodan warhounds}, and {@LinkCreature:37#290#manaathols}.

Report to Taira once you've taken care of them.

I don't want to be stubborn, but there's nothing I can do for you.

Come and see me after you complete your mission.
